titleStmt.title: The common interest of king and people shewing the original, antiquity and excellency of monarchy, compared with aristocracy and democracy, and particularly of our English monarchy, and that absolute, papal and Presbyterian popular supremacy are utterly inconsistent with prerogative, property and liberty / by John Nalson.
titleStmt.author: Nalson, John, 1638?-1686.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
